All Implemented Interfaces:
CardView.Listener, HoleCardView.Listener
public class HoleCardController extends CardController implements HoleCardView.Listener
The controller for the HoleCardView. Manages the behavior of the view.

    • onValidateAnswerClicked

      public void onValidateAnswerClicked(String answer)
      Validates the answer and updates the card score to the Database. If the answer is correct, the score is incremented by 1, else it's decremented by 1. It also sets the card side to be displayed to the answer side. Finally, it shows the "Go to next card" button and hides the "Validate answer" button.
      Specified by:
      onValidateAnswerClicked in interface HoleCardView.Listener
      Parameters:
      answer - the answer
      See Also:
      • HoleCardView.onValidateAnswerClicked(ActionEvent)

    • onGoNextClicked

      public void onGoNextClicked()
      Passes the event to the controller's listener
      Specified by:
      onGoNextClicked in interface HoleCardView.Listener
